website_summaries.verdict: This is a dependable, affordable option that's perfect for those who are new to navigating by a map and compass.
pros: Lightweight compass made of clear, scratch-resistant acrylic
Luminous markings enable you to read the compass even at night
Gives very accurate readings in the northern hemisphere
Comes with a fixed declination correction scale
cons: There have been a few complaints of the acrylic chipping

customer_reviews.title: Amazing what good customer service can do.
customer_reviews.text: This is a revision to my original review. Long story short, my first compass broke, and I found contacting Suunto customer service was not straight forward or easy to do. Once I was able to get in contact with them, Suunto went above and beyond to replace my broken compass. Their replacement shipped from Finland and arrived in California in about 4 business days. Wow. They also sent me a Metric version and USGS version just incase, to make me extra happy. Very high quality customer service. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Handro

customer_reviews.title: did not work. got replacement that works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and got it today... 6/23/18 i pulled it out of the box to see the pointer not moving... maybe im holding it wrong.. so i try to get it as level as possible and still barely moves like its caught on something will not move to north on its own.. i checked this against another compass as well as my compass app... sending it back UPDATE: DIPNDIVE promptly respond to my email and sent me another one that works perfect. Thats great customer service and can definitely recommend them. For that i give 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Tac-Hill

customer_reviews.title: Well built, accurate & right size.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, accurate & right size. Degree dial turns easily when needed but otherwise stays put. I almost didn't buy it because I thought 4 1/2" inches was too long, but turns out it's very reasonable and besides needs to accommodate the 1 1/4" magnifying glass, which is very important for me for 2 reasons: reading fine details on top maps AND for first aid --- e.g., being able to see and pick out a splinter. Heck, you might even be able to start a fire with it with sunlight. "Made in Finland" mark is nice. Good purchase, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindler

customer_reviews.title: The description clearly states that this compass has an adjustable ...
customer_reviews.text: The description clearly states that this compass has an adjustable declination. It does not, it is fixed. Thankfully, Amazon took it back the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: The Suunto A-30L is a pretty good basic compass.
customer_reviews.text: Suunto is one of the best. I own a few Suunto compasses and they haven't let me down. A-30L is a great little compass that you can just throw in your pack, first-aid kit or wherever. Using the included string, you can wear around your neck or attach it to your gear.
customer_reviews.author: todlich

customer_reviews.title: Good compass
customer_reviews.text: These are good compasses. However, they are a bit overpriced and I later learned there were other import versions that are very similar for much less. However, you pay for the brand name. These work well in the field, but it takes a little getting used to them and the two-zone feature is nice, but unneeded by many. The illumination doesn't last forever, so it's a good idea to carry a flashlight in an attempt to "recharge" the bezel in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck BigFiveList

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My compass seemed to have the poles switched and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: DragonLo

customer_reviews.title: Decent Basic Compass But...
customer_reviews.text: Compass is adequate and inexpensive for teaching basic orienteering to Scouts. Works well. However, Amazon description states "liquid filled capsule". Packaging also states it is a liquid filled compass. I even called SUUNTO customer service and they stated it was liquid filled. I received 2 which were not liquid filled. So, bottom line is the compass works. But, it takes a little extra time for the needle to settle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built and precise
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this one. The build quality is excellent and quite precise. Small enough to carry with me. I have placed it in a pouch so that it doesn't get scratched since it is a clear polymer.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Received used broken product
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new product and it was obviously a return. Damaged package and the compass not being attached to needle was big let down.
customer_reviews.author: Copperjohn

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect website decription.. returned
customer_reviews.text: Mislabeled--as another reviewer said the declination is FIXED not ADJUSTABLE, otherwise it is typical awesome Suunto quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. I recommend using it in a familiar environment and with a familiar map to get a sense of its accuracy. That goes for any navigating tools. I was able to use it on a cross country trip. It stayed true but I have never relied on a compass 100%. I try to use land features, the sun/stars and a good map along with the compass. But when I couldn’t use visual references this compass helped me stay on course.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpackers/hikers
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, nice features, and light for hikers/backpackers. Works without batteries or external power. Excellent for use with topo maps. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Badinov

customer_reviews.title: Great compass from I awesome company
customer_reviews.text: This is great compose. I use it to walk around the woods purposely get lost and using this to find my way back. I am buying a couple of more for my boys to do some land nav training.
customer_reviews.author: Sidronio Z. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This product is listed as having adjustable declination but it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is listed as having adjustable declination but it does not. Suunto support confirmed only M Series compasses have adjustable declination.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Segal

customer_reviews.title: Good for entry-level
customer_reviews.text: Good entry-level compass. Price is in line with others, just think this level of device should be a little less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: works as basic compass, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I use it, but it isn't for real usage.. considering giving to nephew as gift. it would work in the field as a backup, but not much more.
customer_reviews.author: Robr

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it is supposed to be. If I ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it is supposed to be. If I had to do it over again, I would upgrade to a model that allows you to adjust for the magnetic declination. Not a big problem where there is little correction necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good Compass
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Becomes part of your everyday kit when volunteering with Civil Air PAtrol
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wood

customer_reviews.title: It works as a simple handheld compass
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic compass, so it gets a basic rating. Unfortunately the sides of this compass are not straight, nor are the sides parallel to one another. So I couldn't use it for my purpose. More of a flimsy kids toy really. But it does seem accurate.
customer_reviews.author: vulcan88

customer_reviews.title: Pointed in 5 different directions claiming NORTH...dosn't work..Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I set it down in 12 different places and got 5 different reading for North...sucks dog....flipping a coin should get me closer to home....don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid E. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: No declination adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: A decent well made instrument as are most Suunto compasses. This is the low end of the line and has no provision for declination adjustment so be forewarned.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Accurate, even with the shifting magnetic pole. Easy to use and teach with.
customer_reviews.author: Treker

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a Suunto compass but there are a little out of range of what I want to pay, but this was a deal and I jumped on it. Great quality, sturdy, and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal McColm

customer_reviews.title: SUUNTO - Quality- Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who’s active outdoors knows that SUUNTO name means quality and reliability. A very inexpensive tool for training or emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Compass
customer_reviews.text: It's a Suunto compass. If you're serious about orienteering you know it's a good compass. If you're new to orienteering, know that it's a good compass. I bought this to replace the last one I had for over a decade. The last one got laser beamed by a satellite radio antenna that reverse polarized it.
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: Great accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Used at shilo military park on compass course....... made finding points great
customer_reviews.author: they call me tater salad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Execellent product from Suunto as usual. I use many of their products. Package quickly arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good Comapss
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken it on a trip yet but it seems to work well walking around the yard. Arrived on time and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Drifter

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Inexpensive but accurate. Nuthin fancy ,just pure dependable,durable and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Mr XTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: magnifier looks to be strong enough to start fires with
customer_reviews.text: another nice campus for night travel pretty basic good glow in the dark capability for night hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Khartoum

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. Field tested. Very accurate, durable and easy to use. I really like the magnification feature.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: NON-ADJUSTABLE DECLINATION
customer_reviews.text: There is a declination correction print on this compass that is nearly impossible to use It is NOT a rotational declination adjustment. NON-ADJUSTABLE DECLINATION
customer_reviews.author: Tony Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good compass
customer_reviews.text: I really like this compass it gets me where I need to go, I recommend it to anyone wanting a good compass.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Super compass!
customer_reviews.text: The needle settles VERY quickly. The magnifier is nice, and the lanyard clip is good to hold on to when taking a bearing. Much prefer this over my previous Silva.
customer_reviews.author: Cantos Evenstar

customer_reviews.title: No treasure yet
customer_reviews.text: Good compass, just need to remember to bring it out with me. Always forget it when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, Glow in the dark
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice compass. Quickly determines north. Haven't used it in the field yet, and I'm a little worried I will scuff up the magnifying glass (plastic) though it seems like a good quality plastic.
customer_reviews.author: F. M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the shipping guarantee.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how nice the product, if it arrives 4 days later than the guaranteed delivery date and two days after the date the product was needed, it's worthless. Thankfully, the cheap Chinese junk compasses I ordered arrived on time and sufficed.

customer_reviews.title: East & West are reversed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Northern Hemisphere version. When pointing North or South the Red Arrow points correctly. When I point to the East the Red Arrow displays as West and vice versa. This is very confusing. I could easily get lost using this.
customer_reviews.author: leon f bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Simple straightforward compass
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it for Boy Scout hikes and backpacking. A solid compass that has everything you need for backcountry trips. No bells and whistles just works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K

customer_reviews.title: fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this compass for the price. works great and is stable. and correct.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very brittle
customer_reviews.text: Works great but is very brittle. Mine cracked when I dropped it on a gravel trail.
customer_reviews.author: cypher

customer_reviews.title: Great compass you cant really go wrong with Suunto compasses
customer_reviews.text: Great compass you cant really go wrong with Suunto compasses. However I did not read the fine print that said there's no true declination adjustment but that was my fault. Compass works great, just what you would expect from Suunto
customer_reviews.author: Dion

customer_reviews.title: A good orienteering compass.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good compass and a good value too. If you are of familiar with an orienteering compass, this is a good choice. The most helpful feature for me so far is the magnifier. It helped me a lot when I tried to read the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great basic compass
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it wasn't the right one for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Queen

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: It's a compass. It works. People will laugh at you and call you a nerd for using it. Then you will save their lives when their phone stops working. Then you will be doing the laughing.
customer_reviews.author: Steve V.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Nice well-made basic compass, but I suggest stringing the lanyard directly through the hole in the compass. The black plastic gizmo that's supposed to go through the hole, then attach to lanyard, seems less than secure.
customer_reviews.author: PAFraser

customer_reviews.title: Just works
customer_reviews.text: I have liked every Suunto compass purchased. IMHO they and Silva make the best compasses. Rugged and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: productwatcher

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Ended up purchasing a MC-2 Pro as I needed mirror. This is a good product for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good thing, nothing in it to mess it up
customer_reviews.text: This is a geat compass. It is a liquid filled piece of perfection. NO AIR BUBBLE IN IT! This is a good thing, nothing in it to mess it up. All things considered, this is a great all around compass for novice and expert alike. And for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Da Barber

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality compass
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality compass,light weight,durable & accurate Compared it to silva compass i own,they both are spot on.Would recommend this as an excellent compass at a very affordable price.

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. A metric scale on one edge would be useful for UTM grid maps.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I love it but I wish it was a bit studier ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but I wish it was a bit studier ( the lanyard and the compass itself), but there are those compasses made for the exact reason I just named. It it what it is though and for what it is its perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Suunto Compass
customer_reviews.text: Tried product and it works great for me. I recommend the company and product. I've used it several times to locate satellite when camping also finding way around in the woods.

customer_reviews.text: After hiking for one day with this compass around my neck, all off the marking had rubbed off. Useless as a map compass.

customer_reviews.text: This compass is durable, light weight and pretty accurate. The best feature is how simple it is. A good buy for the price.

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter needed. She was extremely happy with the quality of the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: A great designed, and well made compass
customer_reviews.text: A great designed, and well made compass. I really like the magnifier built in for reading small Topo lines.

customer_reviews.text: This is my second compass that I have owned. I am not a expert with by far. For a beginner I find that the compass works for basic navigation working from a map and taking bearings off hand. The compass glows brightly from sunlight or flashlight for night work One thing to note about this compass is that it has fixed declination. I wish the cardinal direction letters were bigger.

customer_reviews.title: suunto a-30
customer_reviews.text: Great basic compass. Easy to read, glow in the dark dial and magnifying area for reading maps. Doesn't have all the extras of some top of the line compasses, but it will get you where you're going.

Serves its basic function as an orienteering compass and is not too over the top. I used p-cord instead of the string it came with because the strength but the cord that came with it never broke. I just like to eliminate the possibility. It costs way less then one you may find at an outdoor store. If you buy this compass you wont be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: No cm scale!
customer_reviews.text: Description says inch and cm scale. Picture shows inch on left, cm on right, and 1:24,000 mi on top. Version I received has inch on left, 1:50,000 mi on top and 1:24,000 mi on right. No cm! This is fatal flaw since all my maps are in km. RETURN. Minus 2 stars Otherwise the quality appears fine. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ronbow

customer_reviews.title: Great compass. Use these for our Scout troop
customer_reviews.text: Great compass. Use these for our Scout troop. Easy to read and they hold up to being used by the boys several times a year.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyTime

customer_reviews.title: What can one say about a compass? It points ...
customer_reviews.text: What can one say about a compass? It points to magnetic north and can adjusted for magnetic variation/declination at your location.
customer_reviews.author: ernesto goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy compass...
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy compass, easy to read. And the price was right, good value. Recommended, for the preice you really can't ask for any more.
customer_reviews.author: Survive&Thrive

customer_reviews.title: this is lightweight and easy to
customer_reviews.text: need a basic compass for hiking trip, this is lightweight and easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Well made. works well. Serves me well for ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. works well. Serves me well for camping and day hiking shorter distances. But if was going deep into wilderness, I would take the one with Mirror.

customer_reviews.title: Navigating compass
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my son, who was going on a camping trip with some friends. It was very similar to a compass I had owned for years, and with which I was completely satisfied. My son didn't get lost, came back safe & sound, and had no complaints about the compass.

customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a boy scout and it works great and fits into a pocket.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Nice compass

customer_reviews.title: hahah overall great build and quality
customer_reviews.text: Now only if I can use a compass. hahah overall great build and quality. BUY IT

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to read and dependable.  What else do you need?
customer_reviews.text: Accurate, easy to read and dependable. What else do you need?

customer_reviews.title: Needle rattles a bit
customer_reviews.text: Has all the features I was looking for, but the needle rattles a bit which is disconcerting. Haven't had a chance to use it in the field yet and will update if there are any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for backpacking.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty accurate. Not quite 5 star quality but it gets the job done! Nice size for backpacking.

customer_reviews.title: bought this for my hunter happy brother in law - he is very happy
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my hunter happy brother in law - he is very happy, small enough to pack easily but not so small it gets lost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good compass for the money
customer_reviews.text: Several sources recommended this compass for land navigation. It appears to be well-made and the magnifying lens will come in handy for map reading or starting a fire if need be. It also comes with a handy lanyard. The glow-in-the-dark dial and needle are great! They can be "recharged" with a flashlight and will glow for several minutes. The size is just right and will fit in one of the small pockets on my bug-out bag. For the money this is a good compass for backpacking, hiking, fleeing a zombie apocalypse, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Thacker

customer_reviews.title: but this seems a good value for the money - well built
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick. I don't have any experience with more expensive compasses, but this seems a good value for the money - well built, accurate and likely to serve me for many years. I'd have preferred a slightly longer lanyard, but I'm on the tall side and it seems nothing - not furniture, clothing or gadgets - is ever properly proportioned. I doubt anyone less vertically gifted (6'6") is going to have an issue there.
customer_reviews.author: The Big Pill

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Small and light and it actually works unlike some of those heavy, bulky "military" Chinese made peices of junk.
customer_reviews.author: quittergod

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayakers
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent compass that I purchased mainly for kayaking navigation. It is easy to use and serves the purpose very well.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle67

customer_reviews.title: Great for Satellite Dish Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this compass to set up a portable satellite dish. I had been using a cheaper compass and driving myself crazy trying to get any sort of accurate reading. This compass doesn't have to been held perfectly level to give consistent readings. It's accurate and has transformed my satellite set up from an ordeal to an easy, quick job. I now prefer my small portable manual set up dish to awkwardly larger automatic set up dish which is on its way to a garage sale. Nice product and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: exmptle

product_meta.title: SUUNTO A-30 NH USGS Compass
product_meta.description:
Professional mirror Compass. The advanced navigation Compass. When venturing out into unknown territory, these sighting compasses offer precision navigation with a variety of carefully engineered and dependable features for challenging conditions. Sighting tools for accurate Direction. Rugged construction.

AMAZON.COM
Hailing from Suunto's A-Range of recreational compasses, the A-30L is a compact, well-designed compass for hiking and orienteering, with a luminous bezel and markings that are ideal for navigating in poor visibility. The highly accurate instrument is made of durable, clear, scratch-resistant acrylic that's been ergonomically designed to fit in the palm of your hand. More significantly, the compass employs Suunto's two-zone system to achieve precise, accurate readings regardless of where you're traveling. Previously, most compasses functioned well in only one of five geographic zones. That's because the compasses were balanced differently based on the zone's inclination, i.e., the vertical intensity and direction of the Earth's magnetic field. However, as people began to travel more, it became clear that globe-hopping adventurers needed compasses with a greater geographical range. Suunto's two-zone system, by contrast, considers only the northern and southern hemispheres. In practice, this means that a Suunto compass designed for the northern hemisphere--as the A-30L is--will still work for a fair distance into the southern hemisphere and vice-versa. Suunto is one of only two compass manufacturers to offer two-zone compasses. 

 The lightweight A-30L compass also features a fixed declination correction scale, a jewel bearing, marking holes for drawing control points, a magnifying lens, and a patent-pending snap-lock that detaches easily from the lanyard. The compass measures 2.2 by 4.3 inches and is backed by a lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Lightweight, versatile compass made of durable, clear, scratch-resistant acrylic
Employs Suunto's two-zone system for reliable readings in northern hemisphere
Fixed declination correction scale, jewel bearing, and marking holes for control points
Luminous bezel and markings for navigating in poor visibility; lanyard with detachable snap-lock
